attributes.comment:
My comments are regarding the proposed increase in fees. Adoption has been
such a positive experience for our family.....but we did have a hard time financially
making it happen. I feel that is unconscionable to increase fees - and such a large
amount! - especially for adoption-related petitions. We adopted our daughter from
China, and she has brought so much joy to our family. Now that the wait times for
China are increasing, most families will have to re-do their fingerprints and I-600A
because the originals will expire before a child is assigned. That means they will
be paying over $1600 just for these 2 fees to the US government! It is utterly
ridiculous and just a shame......everything is getting so expensive - the tax on our
home, our electric bill, etc. We will not be able to afford to adopt again. The
increase in fees will be a detriment to those wishing to adopt a child, and an unfair
hardship on some adoptive parents. Please reconsider this increase! Adoption is
SUCH a wonderful thing!!!
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Adoptive Parent, Kristen Fitzgerald
